biolockj.module

Interface DatabaseModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BioModule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassifierModuleImpl, Humann2Classifier, KneadData, Kraken2Classifier, KrakenClassifier, Metaphlan2Classifier, QiimeClassifier, QiimeClosedRefClassifier, QiimeDeNovoClassifier, QiimeOpenRefClassifier, RdpClassifier

    public interface DatabaseModule
extends BioModule
    Interface for BioModules that use a reference database that is used by the DockerUtil to find the correct database directory to map to the container /db volume.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface biolockj.module.BioModule

        MAIN_SCRIPT_PREFIX, OUTPUT_DIR, TEMP_DIR

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      File getDB()
      Return database directory, if multiple databases are configured, they must share a common parent directory and the common parent directory is returned by this method.

      • Methods inherited from interface biolockj.module.BioModule

        checkDependencies, cleanUp, executeTask, getID, getInputFiles, getModuleDir, getOutputDir, getPostRequisiteModules, getPreRequisiteModules, getSummary, getTempDir, init, isValidInputModule

    • Method Detail

      • getDB

        File getDB()
    throws Exception
        Return database directory, if multiple databases are configured, they must share a common parent directory and the common parent directory is returned by this method.
        Returns:
        Database directory
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if any runtime error occurs
